reviewText: excellent; introduction to stick fighting. covers the essential basic moves very well. looking forward to Volume 2.

This is one of two DVD's. I think it is really good on learning Kail.
The other one I found is on You Tube, and is offered by Black Belt magazine; "Kali Sticks Video_ Filipino Fighting Arts Master Julius Melegrito Demonstrates Sinawali Basics"
Both volumes 1 and 2 are excellent. Good clear instructions and easy to follow.

First my background. Years of kickboxing and wrestling but NO experience in stick fighting (A one hour intro at the Fairtex in SF many years does not count)
So I wanted (needed) some basics, a strong foundation if you may and was skeptical about a video being able to provide that. I was wrong. Full Contact Stick Fighting does that and then some. Mr. Stoops is a fantastic instructor. He provides easy-to-follow, yet detailed instructions, showing the footwork and explaining the "why" of this or that thrust. And, building a solid foundation, he adds complexity without overwhelming you. The video quality is also excellent (unlike some others i bought on Amazon:(
All in all a very very good buy.
